review_blob: JKs is wonderful....... If you are only having a bit of it.  Let me explain. This cider looks, tastes and feels like freshly pressed cider. However, it is so sweet that the sweetness becomes overpowering towards the end of a 10 oz pour, nevermind the whole bottle. Two of us shared this as dessert after some great bbq and neither one one of us finished his glass. Overall, I like it despite that it is not very drinkable.
beer_name: J.K.s Cuve Winterruption Farmhouse Hard Cider

review_blob:
a little more dry than I expected, but clean finish indicates only fresh fruit used.  Some are put off by the light straw hue....  But those that know cider will recognize this as a sign of quality fruit used in a quality process.
No oxidation = light hue.
Excellent!
